sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM PARTY_USER WHERE USERNAME = #userName#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY_USER (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, MD5CODE, STATUS, REGISTERDATE, ISREMEMBER, TYPE) VALUES (#id#,#userName#,#password#,#md5code#,#status#,#registerDate#,#isRemember#,#type#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM PARTY_USER WHERE USERNAME = #userName# and password = #password# and status="1"
SELECT P.vedioID, P.series, I.vediolink, I.description, I.date, I.browsers, I.tag FROM PARTY_PREFER_VEDIO P, PARTY_VEDIO_INFO I WHERE P.VEDIOID = I.ID AND I.VALID ="1" order by P.series limit 4
SELECT p.uid, u.username, u.nickname, u.aboutme, u.headimage, u.region, u.platform, p.series FROM party_hot_player p, party_user_details u WHERE p.uid = u.id order by p.series limit 10
SELECT v.id, v.vediolink,v.description, v.date, v.browsers, v.tag FROM party_vedio_info v order by v.browsers DESC limit 10

select v.id, v.vediolink, v.description, v.date, v.browsers, v.tag, hv.userID from party_hot_player h, party_vedio_publish hv, party_vedio_info v where h.uid = hv.userID and hv.vedioID = v.id and v.valid="1" order by h.series limit 4

select v.id, v.vediolink, v.description, v.date, v.browsers, v.tag, uv.userID from party_user u, party_vedio_publish uv, party_vedio_info v where u.id = uv.userID and uv.vedioID = v.id and v.valid="1" order by u.registerdate DESC limit 4
select table_name from RES_SOURCE_TABLE where item_code=#itemCode#
SELECT field_name,field_type FROM RES_SOURCE_TABLE WHERE field_type IN ('0','1','11') AND level_code LIKE (SELECT level_code FROM RES_SOURCE_TABLE WHERE item_code =#itemCode#)||'%'
